bug.author: iimog
bug.summary: Backslash not showing in equation for Tversky Loss
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ðŸ“š Documentation</denchmark-h>
The backslashs in the denominator of the Tversky loss equation is not rendered correctly with MathJax. As shown in this screenshot it only inserts a little space between P and G and thus does not correctly render the equation. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7403236/83774582-28e2c480-a686-11ea-8fd3-dbc509719885.png></denchmark-link>
